alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:19PM EDT until July 21 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hillsborough County in southern New Hampshire... Southwestern Merrimack County in central New Hampshire... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 519 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Marlow to Nelson to near Hinsdale, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Manchester, Nashua, Concord, Henniker, Merrimack, Bedford, Milford, Hooksett, Amherst, Litchfield, Hollis, Peterborough, Hopkinton, New Boston, Antrim, Mont Vernon, Greenfield, Lyndeborough, Bradford and Francestown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 293 between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 89 between mile markers 0 and 11. Interstate 93 between mile markers 18 and 24, and between mile markers 27 and 40. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
